languages.text: {n}Живучий ксенос отказывается умирать, цепляется за жизнь изо всех сил. Но Злобе негде укрыться от вас, и наконец его холодное сердце останавливается. Челюсть безвольно отвисает, изо рта выбрасывается длинный бледно-лиловый язык. Злоба, владыка Ревущих, мертв.{/n}

{n}Resilient to the end, the xenos refuses to die, clinging to his life with every fibre of his being. But there is nowhere for Malice to hide and, in the end, his cold heart stops. His jaw goes slack and his long, pale purple tongue falls out of his mouth. Malice, the master of the Shriekers, is dead.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Живучий ксенос отказывается умирать, цепляется за жизнь изо всех сил. Но Злобе негде укрыться от вас, и наконец его холодное сердце останавливается. Челюсть безвольно отвисает, изо рта выбрасывается длинный бледно-лиловый язык. Злоба, владыка Ревущих, мертв.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族は最後まで死ぬことを拒み、全身全霊でその命にしがみつく。しかし、マリスが隠れられる場所などどこにもなく、最後には冷たい心臓が止まる。彼の顎は緩み、淡い紫色の長い舌が口からダラリと落ちる。シュリーカーのマスター、マリスは死んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Resilient to the end, the xenos refuses to die, clinging to his life with every fibre of his being. But there is nowhere for Malice to hide and, in the end, his cold heart stops. His jaw goes slack and his long, pale purple tongue falls out of his mouth. Malice, the master of the Shriekers, is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は最後まで死ぬことを拒み、全身全霊でその命にしがみつく。しかし、マリスが隠れられる場所などどこにもなく、最後には冷たい心臓が止まる。彼の顎は緩み、淡い紫色の長い舌が口からダラリと落ちる。シュリーカーのマスター、マリスは死んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个异形拒绝接受死亡，拼命想要存活下来，坚持到了最后一刻。然而即便如此，他也无处可藏。到了最后，他邪恶的心脏停止了跳动，紧绷的下巴松弛下来，淡紫色的长舌头从嘴里伸了出来。恶棍，尖啸者的主人，被处决了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Resilient to the end, the xenos refuses to die, clinging to his life with every fibre of his being. But there is nowhere for Malice to hide and, in the end, his cold heart stops. His jaw goes slack and his long, pale purple tongue falls out of his mouth. Malice, the master of the Shriekers, is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个异形拒绝接受死亡，拼命想要存活下来，坚持到了最后一刻。然而即便如此，他也无处可藏。到了最后，他邪恶的心脏停止了跳动，紧绷的下巴松弛下来，淡紫色的长舌头从嘴里伸了出来。恶棍，尖啸者的主人，被处决了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Resiliente hasta el final, el xenos se niega a morir, aferrándose a la vida con cada fibra de su ser, pero Malicia no tiene dónde esconderse y, al final, su frío corazón se detiene. Su mandíbula se afloja y su larga y pálida lengua púrpura cae de su boca. Malicia, el amo de los Aulladores, ha muerto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Resilient to the end, the xenos refuses to die, clinging to his life with every fibre of his being. But there is nowhere for Malice to hide and, in the end, his cold heart stops. His jaw goes slack and his long, pale purple tongue falls out of his mouth. Malice, the master of the Shriekers, is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Resiliente hasta el final, el xenos se niega a morir, aferrándose a la vida con cada fibra de su ser, pero Malicia no tiene dónde esconderse y, al final, su frío corazón se detiene. Su mandíbula se afloja y su larga y pálida lengua púrpura cae de su boca. Malicia, el amo de los Aulladores, ha muerto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hartnäckig bis zum Ende weigert sich der Xenos zu sterben. Er klammert sich mit jeder Faser seines Wesens an sein Leben. Doch Tücke kann sich nirgendwo verstecken, und letztlich hört sein kaltes Herz auf zu schlagen. Sein Kiefer erschlafft und seine lange, blassviolette Zunge hängt ihm aus dem Mund. Tücke, der Meister der Kreischer, ist tot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Resilient to the end, the xenos refuses to die, clinging to his life with every fibre of his being. But there is nowhere for Malice to hide and, in the end, his cold heart stops. His jaw goes slack and his long, pale purple tongue falls out of his mouth. Malice, the master of the Shriekers, is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hartnäckig bis zum Ende weigert sich der Xenos zu sterben. Er klammert sich mit jeder Faser seines Wesens an sein Leben. Doch Tücke kann sich nirgendwo verstecken, und letztlich hört sein kaltes Herz auf zu schlagen. Sein Kiefer erschlafft und seine lange, blassviolette Zunge hängt ihm aus dem Mund. Tücke, der Meister der Kreischer, ist tot.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intraitable jusqu'à la fin, le xénos refuse de mourir et s'accroche à la vie avec chaque fibre de son être, mais Malice n'a nulle part où se cacher, et son cœur de glace finit par lâcher. Sa longue langue pourpre pend de sa mâchoire entrouverte. Malice, maître des Hurleurs, est mort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Resilient to the end, the xenos refuses to die, clinging to his life with every fibre of his being. But there is nowhere for Malice to hide and, in the end, his cold heart stops. His jaw goes slack and his long, pale purple tongue falls out of his mouth. Malice, the master of the Shriekers, is dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intraitable jusqu'à la fin, le xénos refuse de mourir et s'accroche à la vie avec chaque fibre de son être, mais Malice n'a nulle part où se cacher, et son cœur de glace finit par lâcher. Sa longue langue pourpre pend de sa mâchoire entrouverte. Malice, maître des Hurleurs, est mort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşadığı müddetçe direnen zeno, ölmeyi reddedip tüm varlığıyla hayata tutunuyor. Ancak Melanet'in kaçıp saklanabileceği hiçbir yer yok. Nihayetinde, şefkat bilmeyen kalbi duruyor. Ağzı açık kalıyor ve içinden uzun, solgun mor renkli bir dil sarkıyor. Çığırtkanların üstadı Melanet ölüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Resilient to the end, the xenos refuses to die, clinging to his life with every fibre of his being. But there is nowhere for Malice to hide and, in the end, his cold heart stops. His jaw goes slack and his long, pale purple tongue falls out of his mouth. Malice, the master of the Shriekers, is dead.{/n}
